entries.m_all_healed: GREAT!! Looks like everyone is healed! Thanks a bunch!
entries.item_not_medicine: I really only need medicines. You keep it.
entries.m_completed: We appreciate the thought, but I don't think we need anything else!
entries.m_reward: Here is a little token of our appreciation for the help.
entries.m_medicine: Thanks for the help, but we could use a few more medpacks, if you could spare them.
entries.m_enraged: I asked twice. You declined to aid us twice. Just leave us be!
entries.m_rejected: Please tell me that you have changed your mind! Have you?
entries.m_willing: You can just hand me the medication and I will dispense it. Remember, I need one item of medicine for each member of my crew.
entries.m_yes: You'll help? Great!! But, there is only one problem. My crew will only let me administer the medication to them... If you give me one medicine per member of my crew, we would be quite grateful.
entries.m_greet: Hey there! You wouldn't happen to have any medicine that you would be willing to share with some wounded folks that are out of bacta?
